1-Conver Decimal numbers to binary

5 --> 101.
31 --> 11111.
112 --> 1110000.
255 --> 11111111.


2-convert Binary numbers to Decimal

11110001 --> 241
11001010 --> 202
11111111 --> 255
00011100 --> 28



3-Convert this text to binary

-Hello --> 72 101 108 108 111 --> 01001000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111
-Python --> 80 121 116 104 111 110 --> 01010000 01111001 01110100 01101000 01101111 01101110


4-convert this binary to text

01011001 01101111 1110101 --> 89 111 117 --> You.
01000100 01101001 1100100 --> 68 105 100 --> Did.
01000111 01101111 1101111 1100100 --> 71 111 111 100 --> Good.
1001010 01101111 1100010 --> 74 111 98 --> Job.

You Did Good Job.

01010100 01101000 01100001 01101110 01101011 00100000 01111001 01101111 01110101 00101110 --> Thank you.
